title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories on the x axis representing Distribution channel, and Net sales share in each Distribution channel on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Department stores where Net sales share is 42.0.
The lowest category is found at Salon and spa where Net sales share is 3.0.
The highest value at Department stores is almost 14.0 times larger than the minimum value of Salon and spa.
The highest value at Department stores is almost 14.0 times larger than the minimum value of Salon and spa.
The difference between the max Distribution channel Department stores and min Distribution channel Salon and spa is 39.0.
